definition: to cast/to send/to throw oneself (into the river etc)/to seek refuge/to place oneself into the hands of
ticket/ballot/banknote/CL:張|张[zhang1]/person held for ransom/amateur performance of Chinese opera/classifier for groups, batches, business transactions

sentences.chinese: 這是一個無投票權的範疇。

sentences.english: Only people who have a certain amount of property can vote.
sentences.chinese: 也常常受人詬病，等級制是指有產者纔有投票權。

sentences.english: Will investors protest Zuckerberg's proposal for powerless, no-vote shares?
sentences.chinese: 投資者會反對扎克伯格發行無投票權股票的提議嗎？

sentences.english: A decision to restitute gold requires support from an 85 percent majority of the total voting power.
sentences.chinese: 歸還黃金要求得到總投票權的85%的票數支持。

sentences.english: The President shall be a non-voting member of the Board of Directors and all Committees.
sentences.chinese: 總裁是董事會和所有委員會中的無投票權的一員。

sentences.english: Earlier this year, Saudia Arabian women were granted the right to vote.
sentences.chinese: 今年年初，沙特婦女被賦予了投票權。

sentences.english: It entitles you to a portion of the company’s profits as well as voting rights.
sentences.chinese: 它賦予持有者對公司部分收益的所有權及投票權。

sentences.english: Affiliate shall pay the admission fee but have no voting right at the AGM.
sentences.chinese: 附屬會員須交會費，但在會員週年大會上沒有投票權。

sentences.english: The change will make China the third largest shareholder at the Bank.
sentences.chinese: 投票權增加後，中國將成爲世界銀行的第三大股東國。

sentences.english: He regarded his novel as "do[ing] my work for women, better than the suffrage".
sentences.chinese: 他認爲自己的小說“爲女人服務，比投票權還好”。

sentences.english: Name the amendments that guarantee or address voting rights.
sentences.chinese: 請說出保證或提出與投票權相關的修正案。

sentences.english: Four years later, Montana granted women the right to vote.
sentences.chinese: 四年後，蒙大拿給予婦女投票權。

sentences.english: The House of Representatives has how many voting members?
sentences.chinese: 衆院能有投票權的衆議員有多少位？

sentences.english: Some Spanish and Swiss firms are voluntarily starting to offer shareholders a vote.
sentences.chinese: 一些西班牙和瑞士的企業開始自動產生股東投票權。

sentences.english: 1919 - The Netherlands gives women the right to vote.
sentences.chinese: 1919年的今天，荷蘭給予婦女投票權。

sentences.english: Alcott was involved in the movements to end slavery and to gain voting rights for women.
sentences.chinese: 奧爾科特是涉及在動作結束奴隸制和爭取婦女投票權。

definition: to remove sb from their post/to dismiss
